comment.author: 42352180@N03
comment._content: Which one was the Women's Welding Champion? And is there a way to find out the names of these women?

comment.author: 94478132@N05
comment._content: Do you know who took this picture?

comment.author: 35545333@N02
comment._content: My Aunt, Vera Anderson, the Women's Champion Welder, is pictured on the far right, next to a Ingalls official.  Vera retained the title Champion Welder she won in 1943 after being challenged again in 1944.  Vera, sadly passed away August 29, 2013 at age 90. Her trophy and pictures of the welding contests are on display at the Military Museum of Camp Shelby.
